item.title: Education
item.description: University Education 2017: PhD (Dr. rer. nat.) in Linguistics, Centre for Cognitive Neuroscience and Department of Linguistics, University of Salzburg, Austria. Thesis title: “Producing Future: Electrophysiological correlates of linguistic prediction in sentence comprehension”. Thesis supervisors: Prof. Dr. Hubert Haider & Prof. Dr. Dietmar Roehm. 2011: Master of Science (MSc) in Psycholinguistics with distinction at the University of Salzburg, Austria. Thesis title: “Processing a Second Language: Neurocognitive Correlates of Second Language Proficiency”.
